statements: SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionSchedule;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_date, collection_time FROM WasteCollectionSchedule;
SELECT route_id, collection_area FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE collection_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_area FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE route_id = 10 AND collection_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE collection_area = 'Downtown' ORDER BY collection_date ASC, collection_time DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_date, collection_time FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE route_id = 101 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT route_id, collection_area FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE collection_status = 'Pending';
SELECT route_id, collection_date FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE collection_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_area, collection_status FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE collection_date = '2022-05-31' AND collection_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionSchedule;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date, pickup_area FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE collection_date >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT collection_date, pickup_area FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE pickup_area = 'West Side' ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT collection_date, pickup_area FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE pickup_area IN ('East Side', 'North Side') ORDER BY pickup_area;
SELECT r.route_id, r.collection_id, r.vehicle_id, r.driver_id, c.collection_date, c.pickup_area FROM RouteMapping r JOIN WasteCollectionSchedule c ON r.collection_id = c.collection_id;
SELECT * FROM RouteMapping WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE pickup_area = 'Downtown' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RouteMapping WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND driver_id = 5;
SELECT pickup_area, COUNT(collection_id) AS total_collections FROM WasteCollectionSchedule GROUP BY pickup_area HAVING COUNT(collection_id) > 10;
SELECT route_id, collection_date, pickup_area FROM RouteMapping JOIN WasteCollectionSchedule ON RouteMapping.collection_id = WasteCollectionSchedule.collection_id ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionSchedule;
SELECT collection_date, collection_zone FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM CollectionRoutes WHERE route_distance > 20;
SELECT collection_date, collection_time, route_id FROM GarbageCollectionHistory ORDER BY collection_date DESC, collection_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE collection_zone = 'Zone A' AND truck_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionSchedule ORDER BY collection_date DESC, collection_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT collection_zone, COUNT(*) AS total_collections FROM WasteCollectionSchedule GROUP BY collection_zone HAVING total_collections > 5;
SELECT route_name, route_distance FROM CollectionRoutes WHERE route_distance > 100 ORDER BY route_distance DESC;

SELECT c.collection_date, c.collection_time, r.starting_point, r.ending_point FROM GarbageCollectionHistory c INNER JOIN CollectionRoutes r ON c.route_id = r.route_id WHERE c.collection_date >= '2022-01-01' AND c.collection_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(route_distance) AS avg_distance FROM CollectionRoutes;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementRoutes;
SELECT route_name, route_schedule FROM WasteManagementRoutes;
SELECT route_name, route_schedule FROM WasteManagementRoutes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementTrucks ORDER BY truck_capacity DESC;
SELECT bin_location, bin_capacity FROM WasteManagementGarbageBins WHERE bin_capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementRoutes WHERE route_name LIKE '%East%' ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, route_schedule FROM WasteManagementRoutes WHERE route_schedule LIKE '%Monday%' ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementPickups WHERE pickup_date = '2022-08-15' AND pickup_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT bin_location, bin_capacity FROM WasteManagementGarbageBins WHERE bin_capacity > 100 ORDER BY bin_capacity DESC, bin_location ASC;
SELECT truck_license_plate, truck_capacity FROM WasteManagementTrucks WHERE truck_capacity < 10.0 OR truck_license_plate LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY truck_capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementLocation;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM WasteManagementLocation;
SELECT route_name, route_distance FROM WasteCollectionRoute ORDER BY route_distance DESC;
SELECT worker_name, worker_role FROM GarbageCollectionWorker WHERE worker_role = 'Driver';
SELECT schedule_date, schedule_time FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE schedule_date = '2022-04-15';
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementLocation;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM WasteManagementLocation WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT route_name, route_distance, route_status FROM WasteCollectionRoute ORDER BY route_distance DESC;
SELECT schedule_date, schedule_time FROM WasteCollectionSchedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT worker_name, worker_role FROM GarbageCollectionWorker JOIN WorkerAssignment ON GarbageCollectionWorker.worker_id = WorkerAssignment.worker_id WHERE WorkerAssignment.schedule_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
